org.mcm.sws.process
Class LocalActivity

java.lang.Object
  org.mcm.sws.process.Activity
      org.mcm.sws.process.AtomicActivity
          org.mcm.sws.process.LocalActivity
public class LocalActivity
extends AtomicActivity

An activity that is executed locally. The behavior of the acitivity is defined by source code in some programming/scripting language (currently supported is Beanshell/Java)

Author:
Joachim Peer
